name: Music_2223.wav
keywords: ['hip-hop song', 'glass shattering sound', 'sound of throwing objects', 'programmed percussion', 'synth', 'bass', 'moderate tempo', 'no voices']
caption: This hip-hop song features programmed percussion playing a hip-hop beat. The bass follows the root notes of the chords. Synth strings play chords. The sound of an object being thrown can be heard. The sound of shattering glass is also heard. This song appears in a game.
